/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with modern buildings, their glass and steel facades reflecting the clear blue sky. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting a warm glow over the cityscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
